item.description:
Join us for a relaxing, pre-turkey walk through York, Maine. We'll take in tidal rivers, wiggly foot bridges, wilderness woods, a quaint village, rocky cliffs, and majestic ocean views...

 All this, and we'll be back in time for dinner!

I've done this walk before. We'll begin along the York River, crossing a little suspension foot bridge and through the woods. Then we can head along a path that will wend its way toward the ocean, where we'll hike along the cliff walk overlooking the sea.

Parking: Route 103/Lilac Lane just north of the York River - there is parking along the road. (Parking location is subject to change so check back.)

Please email me directly before bringing pets.
Liability Release
AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and his heirs, and all members and participants of the Seacoast Outdoors Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. Kayaking, camping, hiking, bicycling, and other activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.  Fee is for meetup site expenses and planning only.

 

Time and location are subject to change due to weather and other factors. ALWAYS check for time/location changes prior to leaving your house.
item.name: Wiggly Cliff Walk
